short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See Trump for what he is!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elections have consequences!

This extension will replace the avatar photos of Trump on twitter with a poop emoji.
Yes - you read it right. This is the only way I can tolerate his face on Twitter.

Should work on both logged in and incognito modes. This was created with haste so bugs are possible.

Note: I do not own the emojis and they were not made by me.
